snippet: After the vice president’s comments, the White House clarified that he was not articulating a change in policy.
abstract: Comments made by Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr backing same-sex marriage send White House aids scrambling to clarify that Biden was not articulating an official change in policy; reaction from the Obama administration highlights it unease over the subject.

byline.contributor: Mark Landler, Brian Knowlton and Jonathan Weisman contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: After the vice president’s comments, the White House clarified that he was not articulating a change in policy.

headline.seo: Biden Expresses Support for Same-Sex Marriages
headline.main: A Scramble as Biden Backs Same-Sex Marriage
headline.print_headline: A Scramble as Biden Backs Same-Sex Marriage

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
